text: Coordinate models were built for several of the high-resolution reconstructions using 5I08.pdb 16 , 2AJF. pdb 23 and 5X4S pdb 22 as template models with reference to a recently published wild-type SARS S ectodomain (5X58 pdb 22 ). Manual model building was performed in Coot 49 with coordinate refinement in Rosetta Relax 50 and real-space refinement in PHENIX 51 with final rounds of coordinate refinement and ADP estimation performed in PHENIX.
